name: VR Moon Zombies 3D
description:
*** Bloody Zombies on Moon Environment ***
*** The first in game history :) ***
*** Most interesting FPS VR Zombie Shooter game in the market ***
*** Amazing graphics quality, horror sound effects and music ***

Your mission is to escape from the moon. But strangely, it is full of zombies. You need to kill them to survive while you try to solve how to operate the rocket.

How to play:
- Stare where you want to move. It is so easy
- Kill approaching zombies just by targeting them. There will be an indicator for aiming and shooting
- Run solar panels and then rocket to complete the moon mission and escape.

Please help us improving this VR game by leaving your comments and votes on the store.
